numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that a bigger country uses more fossil fuels.
2. I noticed that a bigger country has more clean power supplies.
3. I ask why we do not use only clean power.
4. I ask why we do not get rid of fossil fuels.
5. I noticed that the energy usage of China is on a straight incline.
6. I noticed that the energy usage of the US is a somewhat straight line.
7. I noticed that the energy usage of India is a somewhat straight line.
